channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (12 Oct 2020)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 12 Oct 2020.
